pages.text: $(#b38cff)Void Wisps$() are ethereal entities that dwell in the deepest voids. They drop $(l)Void Essence$(), a crucial ingredient for many advanced alchemy recipes.$(br2)$(4)Natural Spawning:$()$(br)Very rare - only in specific conditions (near bedrock in Overworld Y -64 to -50, or in the Nether at Y 0-15 or Y 120-127).

pages.title: Spawn Egg Recipe
pages.text: Create Void Wisp Spawn Eggs in the $(#b38cff)Alchemy Table$() to summon them on demand. Much easier than waiting for natural spawns!

pages.title: Using Spawn Eggs
pages.text: $(l)How to Use:$()$(br)• Right-click on a block to spawn a Void Wisp$(br)• Best used in enclosed areas$(br)• Wisps are hostile and will attack$(br)• Kill them to collect Void Essence$(br2)$(l)Void Essence Uses:$()$(br)• Enchanted Crystal crafting$(br)• Grand Shulker Box inception$(br)• Various alchemy recipes
